trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Controlla come viene stampato un documento da un'applicazione Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: This class implements a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> and adds a status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe implementa un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> e aggiunge una finestra di dialogo di stato.

trans-unit.source: A print controller specifies how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un controller di stampa come un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> viene stampato.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco dei valori iniziali delle proprietà di un'istanza della classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, vedere il costruttore <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa con Windows Form, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera stampare da un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation, vedere il <xref:System.Printing> dello spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> and assign it to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come creare un nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> e assegnarlo al <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that you have added the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace to the class and that you have created a new instance of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> as `myDocumentPrinter`.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio si presuppone che sia stato aggiunto il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> dello spazio dei nomi per la classe e che è stato creato una nuova istanza di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> come `myDocumentPrinter`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> da incapsulare

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> class, wrapping the supplied <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> mandando a capo l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> fornito.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> da incapsulare

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing a title for the status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.String" /> contenente un titolo per la finestra di dialogo di stato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> class, wrapping the supplied <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> and specifying a title for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" />, includendo l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController" /> fornito e specificando il titolo della finestra di dialogo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> is viene utilizzato per l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> is used for print preview, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog" /> viene utilizzato per l'anteprima di stampa; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.IsPreview%2A> checks the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A> property of the underlying controller.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.IsPreview%2A> controlla la <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A> proprietà del controller sottostante.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento in corso di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> classe chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo incapsulato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> metodo viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se viene generata un'eccezione all'interno di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> non viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> metodo crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> per impostare la modalità stampare una pagina in un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile modificare le impostazioni di pagina separatamente per ogni pagina.) <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> Cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento in corso di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> classe chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo incapsulato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> metodo crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> per determinare quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile ritardare la stampa di 30 minuti o modificare le impostazioni della stampante per il documento.) Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto, mentre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento in corso di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that represents a page from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che rappresenta una pagina di un <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> classe chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo incapsulato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> metodo viene chiamato immediatamente prima di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> metodo crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> imposta il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> per impostare la modalità stampare una pagina in un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile regolare le impostazioni di pagina separatamente per ogni pagina.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument" /> che rappresenta il documento in corso di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> classe chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo incapsulato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> metodo viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> per determinare quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile ritardare la stampa di 30 minuti o modificare le impostazioni della stampante per il documento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> Crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> metodo la deallocazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> è un ottimo strumento per verificare che <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> sono validi.
